title: Enhancing the Functionalities of Personal Health Record Systems: Empirical Study Based on the HL7 Personal Health Record System Functional Model Release 1
details: T Cao, Z Chen, M Nakayama - JMIR Medical Informatics, 2024
abstract: Background: The increasing demand for personal health record (PHR) systems is driven by individuals' desire to actively manage their health care. However, the limited functionality of current PHR systems has affected users' willingness to adopt …
